I'm examining titles right now, and I've noticed that although almost 
all of the province names that show up as titles are followed by "~no 
kami", Kazusa and Kozuke all seem to be followed by "~no Suke".  Is 
there some reason why these two provinces are 'special' (different)?

thanks
